org.sxb.data.redis.connection.jedis

クラス JedisUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisUtils
  • 非推奨です。

    @Deprecated
public abstract class JedisUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class featuring methods for Jedis connection handling, providing support for exception translation. Deprecated in favor of JedisConverters
    作成者:
    Costin Leau, Jennifer Hickey

      非推奨です。 
      Converts the given, native Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.
      static DataAccessException convertJedisAccessException(java.lang.RuntimeException ex)
      非推奨です。 
      Converts the given, native, runtime Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • convertJedisAccessException

        public static DataAccessException convertJedisAccessException(redis.clients.jedis.exceptions.JedisException ex)
        非推奨です。 
        Converts the given, native Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.
        パラメータ:
        ex - Jedis exception
        戻り値:
        converted exception

      • convertJedisAccessException

        public static DataAccessException convertJedisAccessException(java.lang.RuntimeException ex)
        非推奨です。 
        Converts the given, native, runtime Jedis exception to Spring's DAO hierarchy.
        パラメータ:
        ex - Jedis runtime/unchecked exception
        戻り値:
        converted exception
